MountOptions.description: The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

Version.description: The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.
Version.markdownDescription:
The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTOMATIC | NFS3 | NFS4_0 | NFS4_1  
Update requires: No interruption

MountOptions.markdownDescription:
The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

OnPremConfig.description: Contains a list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents that are used to connect an NFS server.

AgentArns.description: ARN(s) of the agent(s) to use for an NFS location.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.markdownDescription:
ARN(s) of the agent(s) to use for an NFS location.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

OnPremConfig.markdownDescription:
Contains a list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents that are used to connect an NFS server.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerHostname.description: The name of the NFS server. This value is the IP address or DNS name of the NFS server.
ServerHostname.markdownDescription:
The name of the NFS server. This value is the IP address or DNS name of the NFS server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])$  
Update requires: Replacement

Subdirectory.description: The subdirectory in the NFS file system that is used to read data from the NFS source location or write data to the NFS destination.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
The subdirectory in the NFS file system that is used to read data from the NFS source location or write data to the NFS destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the NFS location.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the NFS location.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the NFS location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the NFS location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw)://[a-zA-Z0-9./\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
